body:
X11 wasn't installed on all versions of Mac OS X, and the procedure
keeps changing.  You might see if it's an optional item on your OS X
disk.  But, also, Greg, what version of Mac OS are you using?  If it's
Leopard (10.5) or Snow Leopard (10.6), it might be that that version
of the library doesn't exist on Tiger (10.4.)

Randolph

On Mar 17, 2010, at 9:18 PM, Greg Ward wrote:
subject: [Radiance-general] Radiance 4.0 release
